trans-unit.source: Gets the size (in bytes) of network packets used to communicate with an instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 获取用来与实例通信的网络数据包的大小 （以字节为单位） [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: If an application performs bulk copy operations, or sends or receives lots of text or image data, a packet size larger than the default may improve efficiency because it causes fewer network read and write operations.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序执行大容量复制操作，或发送或接收大量文本或图像数据，数据包大小大于默认值可能会提高效率，因为它会导致更少的网络读取和写入操作。

trans-unit.source: If an application sends and receives small amounts of information, you can set the packet size to 512 bytes (using the Packet Size value in the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>), which is sufficient for most data transfer operations.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序发送和接收的信息的信息量很小，你可以将数据包大小设置为 512 个字节 (使用中的数据包大小值<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>)，这对于大多数数据传输操作已经足够。</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection.ConnectionString%2A>

trans-unit.source: For most applications, the default packet size is best.
trans-unit.target: 对于大多数应用程序，默认数据包大小为最佳数值。

trans-unit.source: PacketSize may be a value in the range of 512 and 32767 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 数据包大小可能是中的 512 和 32767 之间的字节范围的值。

trans-unit.source: An exception is generated if the value is outside this range.
trans-unit.target: 如果值超出了此范围，则会生成异常。

trans-unit.source: Setting the default value to a number greater than 8000 will cause the packets to use the MultiPage allocator on the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] instead of the much more efficient SinglePage allocator, reducing the overall scalability of the [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 将默认值设置为一个数字大于 8000 将导致将使用多页的分配器的实例上的数据包[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]而不要高效得多 SinglePage 分配器，从而减少的总体可伸缩性[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: For more information on how [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] uses memory, see [Memory Architecture](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143705) in [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] Books Online.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息如何[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]使用内存，请参阅[内存体系结构](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=143705)中[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]联机丛书。

trans-unit.source: The size (in bytes) of network packets.
trans-unit.target: 网络数据包大小 （以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 8000.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 8000。

trans-unit.source: If statistics gathering is enabled, all values are reset to zero.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了统计信息收集，所有值将重都置为零。

trans-unit.source: If statistics gathering is not enabled and this method is called, no error is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果未启用统计信息收集，并且在调用此方法，不会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: Returns a name value pair collection of statistics at the point in time the method is called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用此方法时返回的点处的统计信息的名称值对集合。

trans-unit.source: When this method is called, the values retrieved are those at the current point in time.
trans-unit.target: 当调用此方法时，检索到的值是当前点处的时间。

trans-unit.source: If you continue using the connection, the values are incorrect.
trans-unit.target: 如果你继续使用该连接，则值是不正确。

trans-unit.source: You need to re-execute the method to obtain the most current values.
trans-unit.target: 你需要重新执行该方法来获取最新的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a reference of type <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> items.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型的引用<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>的<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>项。</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> </xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that contains the version of the instance of [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)] to which the client is connected.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，包含的实例的版本[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/add/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]到客户端连接。

trans-unit.source: The version is of the form *##.##.####*, where the first two digits are the major version, the next two digits are the minor version, and the last four digits are the release version.
trans-unit.target: 版本的形式*# #。 # #。 # # #*，其中前两个数字是否为主要版本，接下来的两位数字是次要版本，，最后四位数是发布版本。

trans-unit.source: The string is of the form *major.minor.build*, where major and minor are exactly two digits and build is exactly four digits.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的形式*major.minor.build*，其中主要和次要是恰好两位，生成是四位数字。

trans-unit.source: When set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, enables statistics gathering for the current connection.
trans-unit.target: 当设置为<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，启用统计信息收集当前连接。

trans-unit.source: Enabling statistics gathering has a minor, but measurable effect on performance and therefore should be enabled only when it is required.
trans-unit.target: 启用统计信息收集小但却显著提高对性能有影响，因此应启用需要时。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if statistics gathering is enabled; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>统计信息收集是否已启用; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
